caption: It's hard to believe it's been almost two weeks now. Last week was the first full week without you here Christina and let me tell you, it's been heartbreaking. But I know you would want us to all be happy and not cry but that's hard to do. I miss you Christina Grimmie! I'll never forget you!!💚 and btw I'm getting this as a tattoo to always remember her. Love you Christina! Fly High Beautiful Angel!!!💚💚💚👼🏼 #TeamGrimmieRawwks
song_album: The Complete Season 6 Collection (The Voice Performance)
